alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT ISLE OF WIGHT...AND NORTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE CENTRAL CITY OF SUFFOLK THROUGH 200 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Fork, or near Windsor, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Windsor and Isle Of Wight around 125 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Central Hill, Whitley, Comet, Longview, Benns Church, Wills Corner, Boaz, Bethel Church, Raynor, and Chuckatuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
